legend_0030_friend_01: If we’re lucky, there’ll be another herb here...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_03:
It really is here! This is one of the herbs, make
no mistake![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_system_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]You and Arven found the
[VAR COLOR(0008)][VAR ITEM2(0001)][VAR COLOR(0000)]!
legend_0030_friend_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Woo-hoo! We did it!
Thanks, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_05:
Now then, let’s see... What does the book have
to say?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_a:
It says here that the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Sweet Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] is good
for gut health and that it helps aid digestion.\c
Says it’s great for stomachaches too, or when
you want to stimulate the ol’ appetite![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_b:
Well, apparently [VAR COLOR(0006)]Salty Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] helps with
aching hands and feet. Good for neuropathy and\r
numbness.\c
When you’ve got muscle weakness, it supposedly
builds up strength again![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_c:
[VAR COLOR(0006)]Bitter Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)]’s great for your circulation!
It really gets the blood flowing!\c
And that warms you right up, nice and toasty,
even boosting the immune system!\c
...Or so it says.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_d:
OK, [VAR COLOR(0006)]Sour Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)] is chock-full of nutrients
and is great for boosting your overall health!\c
Says here it works wonders whether you’re tired
physically or mentally. Perks you right up![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_e:
So it seems [VAR COLOR(0006)]Spicy Herba Mystica[VAR COLOR(0000)]’s supposed to
boost your metabolism!\c
It gives your circulation a boost and helps flush
out all those toxins...along with a ton of sweat![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_06:
If I can just slip this into a tasty sandwich and get
him to eat some...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well, what are we waiting for,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?\r
It’s\r
time\r
to\r
dig in!\c
Let me whip something up for us![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_08:
...And Bob’s your uncle!\c
Here you go! My special, whimsical, herb-filled
super sandwich![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_09:
And it comes with a side of...Titan Badge!
As a token of my gratitude, ’course![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_system_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Do you want to give your sandwich
to [VAR PKNAME(0001)]?
legend_0030_system_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Maybe you want to give your sandwich to
[VAR PKNAME(0001)]\r
after all?
legend_0030_friend_11: Hmph. Is it trying to say thanks or something?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_12: Well, good thing I made extra.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_13:
You’re helping me out a whole bunch with the
hard stuff, so it’s only fair that you get more.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_14:
I definitely, absolutely did not make extra so that
[VAR PKNAME(0001)] could have a sandwich, OK?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_system_04: [VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to dash now!
legend_0030_system_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to jump
higher now!
legend_0030_system_06: [VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to glide now!
legend_0030_system_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to move across the
water now!
legend_0030_system_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] will be able to climb up
vertical\r
surfaces\r
now!
legend_0030_friend_16:
Man, these Herba Mystica really do pack a
punch, don’t they?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_17:
I mean...they’d better. Or else I’m really up
the creek.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_20: Oh, uh...sorry. I shouldn’t have shouted like that...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_21:
I guess I should at least tell you the full story,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_24:
Here you go, bud. Eat up. This sandwich should
help you feel better.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_26: Small bites are fine. Just chew nice and slow...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_27:
My buddy here was...hurt pretty bad a while ago.
Real bad, in fact.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_select_04: Have you tried a Pokémon Center?
legend_0030_friend_29a:
Nothing seems to help. Not Potions, not
Pokémon Centers... Nothing.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_29b:
They said this wasn’t any regular old injury
or illness...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_30:
Mabosstiff here is the only thing in the world I
care about. The only thing...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_31:
So, I promised that I’d make him better—
whatever it takes.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_32:
I searched online, I read books, I looked all over
and tried every cure and remedy I could find.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_33:
But nothing really worked. I’d almost given
up hope...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_34: That’s when I found out about the Herba Mystica![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_35a: I found it in my mom’s lab.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_35b: I found it in my dad’s lab.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_36a: Yeah. See, I found this book in my mom’s lab...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_37b: Yeah. See, I found this book in my dad’s lab...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_38:
It’s this book full of crazy stories and legends
and things—stuff nobody’d usually believe.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_39: But I believe it! I think what it says is true![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_40:
And according to this book, eating all five Herba
Mystica can cure anything that ails you![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_41:
Case in point, Mabosstiff’s paws were cold as ice
before he ate that last herb. But they’ve warmed\r
up a little now—I’m sure they have![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_43:
H-hey! Mabosstiff! Can...can you see? Are your
eyes open?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_45:
It...it’s been so long since he was able to open his
eyes! I was so worried...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_46:
*sniff*
Oh man, I—! I’m so—! I’m so glad![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_47:
*sniffle*
Heh... Ehehehehe... Aw, look at him.\c
Those fiery orange little eyes... Hard to even tell
if they’re open or not, but I know the difference![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_48:
The power of these herbs is amazing! I knew the
book wasn’t lying![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_49:
I’m gonna bring Mabosstiff back to full health,
I swear it![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_50: Oh...uh, yeah. So, that’s my story.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0030_friend_51: Three herbs to go. Let’s find ’em—together![VAR 0114(0006)]
